sourcesContent:
<template>
    <aside>
        <SidebarPost v-for="post in posts" :post="post" :key="post.id"/>
    </aside>
</template>

<script>
import SidebarPost from "./SidebarPost";

export default {
    name: "Sidebar",
    components: {
        SidebarPost
    },
    props: ["posts"],
    methods: {
        onSeparatePost: function() {
            this.$root.$emit("onSeparatePost", "SeparatePost", this.post);
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
